alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued November 16 at 4:19AM PST until November 16 at 6:15AM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Riverside County in southern California... * Until 615 AM PST. * At 418 AM PST, a dust channel was 9 miles east of Desert Center. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Satellite. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 10 between Blythe and Desert Center. CA Route 177 between mile markers 1 and 26. Locations impacted include... Desert Center. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
